word:
You have signally failed in almost every respect. Now the rest of your life seek to get back what you have lost. There is scarcely the pure thread of gold in your character now left, but you may be winning back in a measure 


                                    -226- 

what you have lost by your own foolishness and stubbornness in a wrong course. . . . Let the ledger of heaven give a different record of your course.
